thread.title: Brandiann
thread.title_full: Buddy Allen Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by Brandiann

author: Brandiann
title: Brandiann
text: Great service and work by Buddy Allen! Julie was quick to respond when we inquired about getting new carpet. She came out the next day and within 2 weeks we had beautiful new carpet installed! The installation crew was thorough and excellent as well. Such a great experience- we will definitely be using Buddy Allen, and specifically Julie, for all our carpet and flooring needs!
